General.Name: MHHC Enterprises Inc
General.Description: McCusker Holding Corp., through its subsidiaries, offers help desk and warranty insurance administration services for various industries. The company also offers service programs for the consumer electronics and the heating, ventilating and air conditioning (HVAC) industries. The company was incorporated in 2013 and is based in Olympia, Washington.
General.Address: 400 Union Avenue SE, Olympia, WA, United States, 98501

1.Name: Mr. Raymond  MacKay
1.Title: CEO of MHHC Warranty and Service Inc., CEO of MHHC Reinsurance, Inc. & Director
